text: we all know what this is right broccoli
may be America's favorite vegetable most
recipes as you probably know call for
florets but not the stem and the stem is
the most delicious part the best thing
of all is you don't even have to cook it
it's excellent raw crispy crunchy and so
delicious so just lop off the florets
first and you can save these for
something else also save the leaves
these are really delicious in the salad
also raw what you just need to do is
take your knife and trim off any of
those big nubbins like this use a peeler
to remove the dark green outside of the
stem it's very vibrant and tough okay
see that how it's getting nice and pale
green that's the good stuff that's
really it once you've done this all you
have to do is slice it up and serve it
and just trim it with a knife mmm if you
can believe it this is almost ready to
serve so transfer the pieces to a plate
and then these leaves that we've saved
make for a beautiful garnish how pretty
is that and I like to just drizzle over
the soy sauce this is your only salt so
you can be generous and hot sesame oil
you can also use toasted sesame oil and
toasted sesame seeds as many as you'd
like I like a lot of these for added
crunch and flavor and this is a
beautiful delicious side salad that
comes together in only a few minutes
